trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Hamilton
There were no other sightings in Hamilton on or around July 27th 2005
Summary: I spotted what looked like a strange helicopter in front of us, it had many lights on it including a large spot light
divs: Sighting DetailsHi I was driving near Hamilton Ontario with a friend of mine earlier this evening we were leaving his parents at 12:22 pm. we were driving down the back road from his parents farm house when I spotted what looked like a strange helicopter in front of us, it had many lights on it including a large spot light and it didn't move like a helicopter but it was floating, and it didn't look like a helicopter either. we stopped the car and rolled down the windows as it passed over us and it made no noise at all!!! we were puzzled and watched it float over the field to our left, then all of a sudden all the lights went off and it disappeared!!! Judging by how it moved I'd guess it was some kind of vertical take off jet but it was by far the strangest thing I've ever seen in my life. 2 minutes after it disappeared I called 911 reporting it to the local police. Despite how crazy I felt reporting it they took my call quite seriously and are looking into the matter.
